## MatrixBuilder.ones() method

Constructs a matrix of the specified dimensions, consisting of all ones

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ones(numberOfRows: number, numberOfColumns?: number): M;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  numberOfRows | <code>number</code> | The number of rows the new matrix should have |
|  numberOfColumns | <code>number</code> | The number of columns the new matrix should have |

<b>Returns:</b>

`M`

The new matrix

## Example


```
const allOnes = matrixBuilder.ones(2, 3);

// [ 1 1 1 ]
// [ 1 1 1 ]

```
